description:
Open to claim one advanced material for weapon breakthrough or skill upgrade of your choice:
<color=Rare4>Polarized Metallic Drip *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Refined Phlogiston *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Andante Helix *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Waveworn Residue 235 *1</color>
<color=Rare4>Cadence Leaf *1</color>
bgDescription: The special supply pack issued by the Store. It is delivered to the customer by Lollo Logistics. Open to claim rich supplies.
